page.title: 14THE COLISEUM THEATRE,OLDHAM
page.content: THE COLISEUM IS NEARLY 100 YEARS OLD. WITH ROOM FOR 576 PEOPLE,IT IS ALWAYS FULL FOR THE YEARLY PANTOMIME.PLAYS ARE NOT USUALLY AS WELL ATTENDED.THE COLISEUM DOES 8 PROFESSIONAL PLAYS, 5 AMATEUR PLAYS AND 1 PANTOMIME EVERY YEAR.SOME PLAYS HAVE VERY POOR ATTENDANCES AND LOSE MONEY.SHORTAGE OF MONEY IS A CONSTANT WORRY.THE MANAGER HAS DECIDED TO OPEN ON SUNDAY NIGHTS BECAUSE PEOPLE ARE FREE THEN.HE WANTS MORE PUBLICITY AND PLANS TO SEND A GROUP OF ACTORS ROUND THE SCHOOLS TO ENCOURAGE CHILDREN TO SUPPORT THE THEATRE.MANY FAMOUS ACTORS BEGAN THERE INCLUDING ERIC SYKES,DORA BRYAN,FILM STAR JANET MUNROE AND HALF THE CAST OF CORONATION STREET,THE FAMOUS TELEVISION 'SOAP OPERA'.THE COLISEUM HAS ITS OWN CARPENTERS TO MAKE THE SCENERY.THEY LIVE ACROSS THE ROAD FROM THE THEATRE.
